item.title: H&M Jeans

item.description: 5-pocket jeans in stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
item.content:encoded:

5-pocket jeans in stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.

Size & Fit

The model (height 6′) is wearing a size 32

Material & Care

Machine wash

Men Olive Green Solid Active Bomber Jacket

item.content:encoded:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Product design details

  • Breathable fabric helps sweat dry fast.

Size & Fit
